text: Afifah Rahim is very dedicated to her work and service to me. In fact, she is very kind and helpful all customers before and after me regardless of nationalities or race. She is an asset to CIMB bank. Please appreciate her hardwork. Thumbs up to the good people who make the experience for this branch great üëç

"I had an exceptional experience with Banker Intan Amaliah Binti Awang. Her professionalism, knowledge, and friendly demeanor made the entire process seamless and stress-free. She took the time to understand my needs and provided personalized solutions. Her excellent communication skills and prompt follow-up ensured that all my queries were addressed. I highly recommend Intan Amaliah for her outstanding service and dedication.Thank  you .

TELAI MUTHU

I would like to extend my heartfelt appreciation to Ms. Nur'Afifah for her outstanding customer service. Despite my late arrival at the bank at 4:30 PM, when the branch was close to its closing time, Ms. Nur'Afifah went above and beyond to assist me with replacing my expired debit card.

Her willingness to serve me with such diligence and professionalism, even after a long day, is truly commendable. She handled my inquiry efficiently and with a warm demeanor, making what could have been a stressful situation a smooth and pleasant experience.

It‚Äôs rare to encounter such dedication and commitment to customer satisfaction, and I believe Ms. Nur'Afifah is a valuable asset to the team. I am genuinely grateful for her efforts and hope her exceptional service is recognized and celebrated.

Thank you, Ms. Nur'Afifah, for making a difference!
Such friendly and helpful staff! A big difference to the usual bank experience I have. Kudos to Sofiah and Afifah. Definitely the nicest branch I have visited.
